availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert F. Colvin (Pendleton County Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Pendleton County farmer and Pendleton County Justice of the Peace. Kentucky native. Married Sarah W. Colvin. Father of Nancy M. Colvin, Lewis W. Colvin, Benjamin F. Colvin, Sarah E. Colvin, Robert H. Colvin. Pendleton County Justice of the Peace.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 1, p. 363. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 24. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, Precinct 1, p. 48. “Robert Forsythe Colvin,” Find A Grave, September 8, 2013, Memorial no. 116750058.
